casebody.data:
Willie SMITH, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
AUTOMOBILE CLUB INSURANCE ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158242
COA: 337924 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 19, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
